name: read-object
description: Read Kubernetes objects from cluster for your workflow steps

parameters.usage: Specify the apiVersion of the object, defaults to 'core.oam.dev/v1beta1'
parameters.name: apiVersion

parameters.usage: Specify the kind of the object, defaults to Application
parameters.name: kind

parameters.usage: Specify the name of the object
parameters.name: name

parameters.usage: The namespace of the resource you want to read
parameters.name: namespace

parameters.usage: The cluster you want to apply the resource to, default is the current control plane cluster
parameters.name: cluster
